logic

Class Suspicious

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Character
      • logic.Guard
        • logic.Suspicious
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestSuspicious

    public class Suspicious
extends Guard
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy). This specific type (pseudo)randomly reverses its route orientation.
    Author:
    Jo√£o Vieira, Susana Lima
    See Also:

      • updateGuard

        public char updateGuard()
        Updates this Drunken status accordingly to its current state. num is a random number that determines if this Suspicious will reverse its route or not.
        Overrides:
        updateGuard in class Guard
        Returns:
        the next value of this Guard route
